objects.name: BeginningText
objects.string:
Black, spinning circles are enemies. These enemies will deteriorate your vision, and are unavoidable. However, where enemies are, there are always more behind them. 

Multi-colored circles are friends -- these will alleviate your vision. Walk through them!

objects.name: DeathText
objects.string:
You've lost...
Don't fret. Things will get better soon.

objects.name: FinishText
objects.string:
You're a strong one. Even though walls appear in front of you, you present a ladder to overcome it.
You've won.
